thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Veronica K
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Veronica K

author: Veronica K
title: Veronica K
text: I'm so happy I found thrift books! I read a ton lately! Whenever I find books I want to read, instead of spending $10-$40 on books I can spend a few bucks or less than $20! And don't get me started on free shipping after $10, seriously? As if they're just giving them away. I feel great about it and I hope TriftBooks does too. Plus it gets me reading even more :) thanks
